webbar.description: Add customizable web links to VS Code status bar
webbar.configuration.title: WebBar
webbar.webBarButtons.description: List of buttons to display in the status bar
webbar.webBarButtons.icon.description: VS Code built-in icon, supports: $(globe), $(git-branch), $(book), $(link), $(link-external), $(browser), $(heart), $(star), $(repo), $(home), etc.
webbar.webBarButtons.priority.descriptio: Button sorting priority (higher value = closer to the edge)
webbar.webBarButtons.tooltip.description: Tooltip information displayed on mouse hover (optional)
webbar.webBarButtons.url.description: Web address to open when button is clicked
